title: Luxury
author: VD
content_html: A bag of leaves? Luxury! When I was a child, we were forced to get up four hours before we went to bed and our father used to make us lick leaves off the road with our tongues….
content_text: A bag of leaves?  Luxury!  When I was a child, we were forced to get up four hours before we went to bed and our father used to make us lick leaves off the road with our tongues….
